   20: -module(bif_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("syntax_tools/include/merl.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   25: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   26:          unsafe_get_list/1,
   27: 	 beam_validator/1,trunc_and_friends/1,cover_safe_and_pure_bifs/1,
   28:          cover_trim/1,
   29:          head_tail/1,
   30:          min_max/1,
   31:          non_throwing/1]).
   32: 
   33: suite() ->
   34:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   35: 
   36: all() ->
   37:     [{group,p}].
   38: 
   39: groups() ->
   40:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   41:       [beam_validator,
   42:        unsafe_get_list,
   43:        trunc_and_friends,
   44:        cover_safe_and_pure_bifs,
   45:        cover_trim,
   46:        head_tail,
   47:        min_max,
   48:        non_throwing
   49:       ]}].
   50: 
   51: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   52:     _ = id(Config),
   53:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   57:     ok.
   58: 
   59: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: unsafe_get_list(_Config) ->
   66:     [[1], [1], [1]] = create_rows(id(3)),
   67:     ok.
   68: 
   69: create_rows(Num) -> create_rows(Num, [[1]]).
   70: 
   71: create_rows(1, Rows) ->
   72:     Rows;
   73: create_rows(Num, [PrevRow | _] = Rows) ->
   74:     [_PrevRowH | PrevRowT] = PrevRow,
   75:     [] = first(PrevRowT, PrevRow),
   76:     create_rows(Num - 1, [[1] | Rows]).
   77: 
   78: first(Fst, _Snd) -> Fst.
   79: 
   80: %% Cover code in beam_validator.
   81: 
   82: beam_validator(Config) ->
   83:     [false,Config] = food(Config),
   84: 
   85:     true = is_number(42.0),
   86:     false = is_port(Config),
   87: 
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: food(Curriculum) ->
   91:     [try
   92: 	 is_bitstring(functions)
   93:      catch _ ->
   94: 	     0
   95:      end, Curriculum].
   96: 
   97: %% Test trunc/1, round/1, floor/1, ceil/1.
   98: trunc_and_friends(_Config) ->
   99:     Bifs = [trunc,round,floor,ceil],
  100:     Fs = trunc_and_friends_1(Bifs),
  101:     Mod = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
  102:     Calls = [begin
  103: 		 Atom = erl_syntax:function_name(N),
  104: 		 ?Q("'@Atom'()")
  105: 	     end || N <- Fs],
  106:     Tree = ?Q(["-module('@Mod@').",
  107: 	       "-export([test/0]).",
  108: 	       "test() -> _@Calls, ok.",
  109: 	       "id(I) -> I."]) ++ Fs,
  110:     merl:print(Tree),
  111:     Opts = test_lib:opt_opts(?MODULE),
  112:     {ok,_Bin} = merl:compile_and_load(Tree, Opts),
  113:     Mod:test(),
  114:     ok.
  115: 
  116: trunc_and_friends_1([F|Fs]) ->
  117:     Func = list_to_atom("f"++integer_to_list(length(Fs))),
  118:     [trunc_template(Func, F)|trunc_and_friends_1(Fs)];
  119: trunc_and_friends_1([]) -> [].
  120: 
  121: trunc_template(Func, Bif) ->
  122:     Val = 42.77,
  123:     Res = erlang:Bif(Val),
  124:     FloatRes = float(Res),
  125:     ?Q("'@Func@'() ->
  126:         Var = id(_@Val@),
  127:         if _@Bif@(Var) =:= _@Res@ -> ok end,
  128: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@FloatRes@ -> ok end,
  129: 	if _@Bif@(Var) == _@Res@ -> ok end,
  130:         _@Res@ = _@Bif@(Var),
  131:         try begin _@Bif@(a), ok end
  132:         catch error:badarg -> ok end,
  133:         ok.").
  134: 
  135: cover_safe_and_pure_bifs(Config) ->
  136:     _ = get(),
  137:     _ = get_keys(a),
  138:     _ = group_leader(),
  139:     _ = is_alive(),
  140:     _ = min(Config, []),
  141:     _ = nodes(),
  142:     _ = erlang:ports(),
  143:     _ = pre_loaded(),
  144:     _ = processes(),
  145:     _ = registered(),
  146:     _ = term_to_binary(Config),
  147:     42 = list_to_integer("2A", 16),
  148:     a = binary_to_atom(atom_to_binary(a)),
  149: 
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: cover_trim(_Config) ->
  153:     ok = cover_trim_1(<<"abc">>, id([42])),
  154:     ok = cover_trim_1({a,b,c}, id([42])),
  155: 
  156:     true = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "1"),
  157:     false = cover_trim_2("keep-alive", "0"),
  158:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "1"),
  159:     false = cover_trim_2("other", "0"),
  160: 
  161:     true = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", -1),
  162:     false = cover_trim_3("keep-alive", 100),
  163:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -10),
  164:     false = cover_trim_3("other", -100),
  165: 
  166:     ok.
  167: 
  168: cover_trim_1(Something, V) ->
  169:     id(Something),
  170:     id(Something),
  171:     if
  172:         hd(V) =:= 42 ->
  173:             ok
  174:     end.
  175: 
  176: cover_trim_2(Header, NList)->
  177:     id(0),
  178:     case id(Header) of
  179:         "keep-alive" when hd(NList) >= $1 ->
  180:             true;
  181:         _Connect ->
  182:             false
  183:     end.
  184: 
  185: cover_trim_3(Header, N)->
  186:     id(0),
  187:     case id(Header) of
  188:         "keep-alive" when abs(N) < 42 ->
  189:             true;
  190:         _Connect ->
  191:             false
  192:     end.
  193: 
  194: %% GH-7024: The loader transformations for hd/1 and tl/1 were incorrect and
  195: %% failed when certain optimizations were turned off.
  196: head_tail(_Config) ->
  197:     {1, ok} = head_case(),
  198:     {1, ok} = tail_case(),
  199: 
  200:     1 = hd(id([1])),
  201:     [] = tl(id([1])),
  202: 
  203:     ok.
  204: 
  205: head_case() ->
  206:     case 1 of
  207:         X when hd(X) -> blurf;
  208:         X -> {X, ok}
  209:     end.
  210: 
  211: tail_case() ->
  212:     case 1 of
  213:         X when tl(X) -> blurf;
  214:         X -> {X, ok}
  215:     end.
  216: 
  217: min_max(_Config) ->
  218:     False = id(false),
  219:     True = id(true),
  220: 
  221:     false = bool_min_false(False, False),
  222:     false = bool_min_false(False, True),
  223:     false = bool_min_false(True, False),
  224:     true = bool_min_true(True, True),
  225: 
  226:     false = bool_max_false(False, False),
  227:     true = bool_max_true(False, True),
  228:     true = bool_max_true(True, False),
  229:     true = bool_max_true(True, True),
  230: 
  231:     11 = min_increment(100),
  232:     11 = min_increment(10),
  233:     10 = min_increment(9),
  234:     1 = min_increment(0),
  235:     0 = min_increment(-1),
  236:     11 = min_increment(a),
  237: 
  238:     {42,42} = max_number(id(42)),
  239:     {42,42.0} = max_number(id(42.0)),
  240:     {-1,1} = max_number(id(-1)),
  241:     {-1,1} = max_number(id(-1.0)),
  242: 
  243:     100 = int_clamped_add(-1),
  244:     100 = int_clamped_add(0),
  245:     105 = int_clamped_add(5),
  246:     110 = int_clamped_add(10),
  247:     110 = int_clamped_add(11),
  248: 
  249:     100 = num_clamped_add(-1),
  250:     100 = num_clamped_add(0),
  251:     105 = num_clamped_add(5),
  252:     110 = num_clamped_add(10),
  253:     110 = num_clamped_add(11),
  254: 
  255:     105 = num_clamped_add(5),
  256:     105.0 = num_clamped_add(5.0),
  257:     110 = num_clamped_add(a),
  258:     110 = num_clamped_add({a,b,c}),
  259:     110 = num_clamped_add({a,b,c}),
  260: 
  261:     ok.
  262: 
  263: %% GH-7170: The following functions would cause a crash in
  264: %% beam_ssa_codegen.
  265: 
  266: bool_min_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  267:     false = min(A, B).
  268: 
  269: bool_min_true(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  270:     true = min(A, B).
  271: 
  272: bool_max_false(A, B) when is_boolean(A), is_boolean(B) ->
  273:     false = max(A, B).
  274: 
  275: bool_max_true(A, B) when is_boolean(B) ->
  276:     true = max(A, B),
  277:     if
  278:         is_boolean(A) ->
  279:             true = max(A, B)
  280:     end.
  281: 
  282: max_number(A) ->
  283:     Res = {trunc(A), max(A, 1)},
  284:     Res = {trunc(A), max(1, A)}.
  285: 
  286: min_increment(A) ->
  287:     Res = min(10, A) + 1,
  288:     Res = min(A, 10) + 1,
  289:     Res = min(id(A), 10) + 1.
  290: 
  291: int_clamped_add(A) when is_integer(A) ->
  292:     min(max(A, 0), 10) + 100.
  293: 
  294: num_clamped_add(A) ->
  295:     min(max(A, 0), 10) + 100.
  296: 
  297: non_throwing(_Config) ->
  298:     abc = thing_to_atom(~"abc"),
  299:     [] = thing_to_atom(a),
  300:     [] = thing_to_atom(42),
  301:     [] = thing_to_atom([a,b,c]),
  302:     erlang = thing_to_existing_atom(~"erlang"),
  303:     [] = thing_to_existing_atom(~"not an existing atom"),
  304:     [] = thing_to_existing_atom(a),
  305:     ok.
  306: 
  307: thing_to_atom(Bin0) ->
  308:     Bin = id(Bin0),
  309:     Res = try
  310:               binary_to_atom(Bin)
  311:           catch
  312:               _:_ ->
  313:                   []
  314:           end,
  315:     Res = try
  316:               binary_to_atom(Bin, utf8)
  317:           catch
  318:               _:_ ->
  319:                   []
  320:           end,
  321:     if
  322:         is_atom(Res) ->
  323:             List = unicode:characters_to_list(Bin),
  324:             Res = try
  325:                       list_to_atom(List)
  326:                   catch
  327:                       _:_ ->
  328:                           []
  329:                   end;
  330:         true ->
  331:             Res
  332:     end.
  333: thing_to_existing_atom(Bin0) ->
  334:     Bin = id(Bin0),
  335:     Res = try
  336:               binary_to_existing_atom(Bin)
  337:           catch
  338:               _:_ ->
  339:                   []
  340:           end,
  341:     Res = try
  342:               binary_to_existing_atom(Bin, utf8)
  343:           catch
  344:               _:_ ->
  345:                   []
  346:           end,
  347:     if
  348:         is_atom(Res) ->
  349:             List = unicode:characters_to_list(Bin),
  350:             Res = try
  351:                       list_to_existing_atom(List)
  352:                   catch
  353:                       _:_ ->
  354:                           []
  355:                   end;
  356:         true ->
  357:             Res
  358:     end.
  359: 
  360: %%%
  361: %%% Common utilities.
  362: %%%
  363: 
  364: id(I) ->
  365:     I.
